kpiwidget 0.0.0.9000

    • Getting started

    Getting started

    getting_started.Rmd
    library(flexdashboard)
library(kpiwidget)
    library(crosstalk)
library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'dplyr'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
library(htmltools)

# Example data
df <- mtcars %>% 
  mutate(model = rownames(.))

# Wrap in SharedData with row numbers as keys
sd <- SharedData$new(df, key = ~1:nrow(df), group = "mtcars_group")
      
    filter_checkbox("gear", "Gear", sd, ~gear, inline = TRUE)
     

    Column parameter must be provided. Default kpi is count (lenght of dataset).

    kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "mpg",
  height = "25px")
     

    KPI options

    sum 

    kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "mpg",
  kpi = "sum",
  height = "25px")

    mean 

    kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "mpg",
  kpi = "mean",
  height = "25px")

    min 

    kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "mpg",
  kpi = "min",
  height = "25px")

    max 

    kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "mpg",
  kpi = "max",
  height = "25px")

    count 

    kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "mpg",
  kpi = "count",
  height = "25px")

    distinctCount 

    kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "cyl",
  kpi = "distinctCount",
  height = "25px")

    ratio 

    kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "mpg",
  kpi = "sum",
  comparison = "ratio",
  group1 = ~cyl == 4,
  height = "25px")

    share 

    kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "mpg",
  kpi = "sum",
  comparison = "share",
  group1 = ~cyl == 4,
  group2 = ~cyl == 6,
  height = "25px")
